name: uncrowned
content:
uncrowned king/queen
Add to word list
Add to word list
a man or woman who is considered to be the best, the most famous, or the most powerful in a particular area of life, especially when they do not have an official rank or title: Django Reinhardt, the uncrowned king of jazz guitarists
